name: packfire/framework
description: The rapid-development object-oriented framework for PHP. Be surprised at how fast you can build a web application with a pack of fire.

suggest.ext-apc: APC caching support can be selected through the use of \Packfire\Cache\ApcCache but requires the APC extension.
suggest.ext-memcache: MemCache caching support can be selected through the use of \Packfire\Cache\MemCache but requires the MemCache extension.
suggest.ext-dom: DOM support is required when using Packfire\Data\Serialization\XmlSerializer.
suggest.ext-curl: Curl support is required when using Packfire\Net\Http\Server's functionality to send and receive data to another HTTP server.
